doc.name: StaticALU
doc.description: A static integer arithmetic logic unit.
doc.author: Man-Kit Leung
doc.port: Input port for the first operand. The port type is integer.
Input port for the second operand. The port type is integer.
Output port. The type is inferred from the connections.
doc.property: Input port for the operation code. The port type is integer. The value of the input tokens should not exceed the number of operations supported.
